solution_line_template: The larger box of macaroni and cheese costs {larger_box_cost_cents} cents / {larger_box_ounces} ounces = <<{larger_box_cost_cents}/{larger_box_ounces}={larger_box_price_per_ounce}>>{larger_box_price_per_ounce} cents per ounce.

The smaller box of macaroni and cheese costs {smaller_box_cost_cents} cents / {smaller_box_ounces} ounces = <<{smaller_box_cost_cents}/{smaller_box_ounces}={smaller_box_price_per_ounce}>>{smaller_box_price_per_ounce} cents per ounce.
The lower price per ounce is <<{better_value_price_per_ounce}={better_value_price_per_ounce}>>{better_value_price_per_ounce} cents.
